item.title: The Psychology of Money - Notes
item.description: This is about The Psychology of Money by Morgan Housel, a Columnist. This book became a sensation in the #fintwit. Many tweeters recommended the book and I preordered it on Amazon. Cover page The book is crisp - 240 pages grouped into 20 chapters, each having few stories to explain actions behind money decisions. Notes from each of the chapter
